PHRASE.LANG: After his demise, Colonel Radec’s custom-made combat helmet was submitted to ISA Command for analysis. Initial tests have revealed that it contains built-in respiration and communication facilities, but a sudden increase in security breaches at the ISA facility has delayed further analysis. [#Legal]

À la mort du colonel Radec, son casque de combat personnalisé a été envoyé à l'ISA pour analyse. Les premiers examens ont révélé qu'il est équipé de systèmes de respiration et de communication intégrés, mais les analyses ont été suspendues à cause de la hausse soudaine des manquements aux règles de sécurité dans le bâtiment de l'ISA. [#Legal]

Tras la muerte del coronel Radec, su casco de combate, hecho a medida, se envió al mando ISA para ser analizado. Las pruebas iniciales revelaron que integra un sistema de respiración y comunicación. No obstante, el aumento de los problemas de seguridad en las instalaciones de los ISA ha imposibilitado un análisis más profundo. [#Legal]
라덱 대령이 최후를 맞은 다음, 그의 커스텀 헬멧은 ISA 지휘부로 넘겨져 분석되었습니다. 호흡과 통신 기능이 내장되었다는 사실이 처음 밝혀진 후, ISA의 연구소에 계속되는 보안 습격으로 인해 그 이상의 연구는 진척된 바가 없습니다. [#Legal]

After his demise, Colonel Radec’s custom-made combat helmet was submitted to ISA Command for analysis. Initial tests have revealed that it contains built-in respiration and communication facilities, but a sudden increase in security breaches at the ISA facility has delayed further analysis. [#Legal]
Radec上校死後，他的特製戰鬥頭盔被送至ISA司令部進行分析。初部測試顯示，該頭盔內置呼吸和通訊設備。但由於ISA設施的保安系統突然遭到入侵，進一步的分析被逼推遲。[#Legal]
Radec上校死後，他的特製戰鬥頭盔被送至ISA司令部進行分析。初部測試顯示，該頭盔內置呼吸和通訊設備。但由於ISA設施的保安系統突然遭到入侵，進一步的分析被逼推遲。[#Legal]

After his demise, Colonel Radec’s custom-made combat helmet was submitted to ISA Command for analysis. Initial tests have revealed that it contains built-in respiration and communication facilities, but a sudden increase in security breaches at the ISA facility has delayed further analysis. [#Legal]
